scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc && cp package.json www/package.json && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
scripts.setappenv: eb setenv POSTGRES_USER=$POSTGRES_USER PORT=$PORT   db_port=$DB_PORT POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST URL=$URL;eb use Udagramfullstack-env; eb deploy
scripts.deploy: npm run build && eb setenv AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION POSTGRES_USER=$POSTGRES_USER  POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD  POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB  PORT=$PORT POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST  AWS_REGION=$AWS_REGION  AWS_PROFILE=$AWS_PROFILE AWS_BUCKET=$AWS_BUCKET  URL=$URL db_port=$DB_PORT  JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET ;eb use udaapp-env  ; eb deploy
